feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Pull out new code editor field and drawer bindable slot into single component by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15545
  • Speed up loop.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15674
  • De-mock dynamodb by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15664
  • Small fix to googlesheets mock. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15671
  • Add extra date helpers by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15682
  • Create a new automation step for executing JS by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15366
  • [BUDI-9006] Allow automation test data modal to select real data by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15442
  • Execute Script V2 - UX by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15461
  • Copy to Clipboard button action by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15689
  • Fixes validation text in custom user roles by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15697
  • New automation JS editor fixes. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15696
  • Import OpenAPI fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15698
  • Documentation link in App Action by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15684
  • Fix S3 integration custom endpoints usage by @CSLTech in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15701

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.24...3.5.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Check types in client by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15705
  • Remove unnecessary sortType on api definition by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15668
  • Group performance improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15665
  • Migrate misc.spec.ts to TS. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15687
  • Convert middleware tests to TS, remove mocks. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15686
  • Allow uploading attachments through views by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15679
  • Allow uploading of signatures through views by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15722

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.5.0...3.5.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't show row test data selector outside of test modal. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15719

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.5.1...3.5.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove on:focus event attribute from Icon by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15725
  • More BBUI types and tidy up by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15669
  • Initial scaffolding for using LLMs to generate JS in Budibase. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15711
  • Initial oAuth2 config crud by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15732
  • JS V2 Step bindings parsing and JS quote pattern update by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15734
  • Type fields by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15706
  • Revert "Remove unnecessary sortType on api definition" by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15735

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.5.2...3.5.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removing un-necessary log statement by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15737
  • Default app design improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15709
  • JS V2 On blur update by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15738
  • Send context information to the JS generation endpoint. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15728
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15743
  • Fix save button state on rest by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15744
  • Autosave rest authentication settings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15745
  • Bind the password form by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15748
  • Filtering updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15749
  • Style tweaks by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15750
  • Modal to prevent losing REST datasource changes by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15752
  • Use OAuth2 on rest by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15733
  • New rest auth picker by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15742
  • Enabling svelte generics support in eslint by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15761
  • Typescript conversion of CreateEditColumn.svelte by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15747
  • Support attachment and signature columns for SQL databases by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15736
  • OAuth2 configuration frontend by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15740
  • OAuth2 config validation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15753
  • Implement edit and delete config endpoints by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15755
  • Allow selecting oauth2 configs by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15765
  • Edit/delete configs frontend implementation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15763
  • Validate config by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15769
  • Support header and body method by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15771
  • File component ts conversion by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15770
  • TS conversion for ColorPicker component by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15777
  • Client form to TS by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15655
  • Fixing an issue where query bindings could not be added by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15783
  • Split oauthconfig per document by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15782

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.5.3...3.6.0
